name: Package Tracker
short_description:
track packages shipped via UPS, UPS MI, USPS, FedEx, & FedEx SmartPost + a few more!

you can log in to your eBay, gmail, and pdExpress accounts through the settings tab in the GUI.. all passwords are encrypted using your computers unique hardware ID's so the decryption key is different on every computer that package tracker runs on.

did your eBay item just ship? well click the add button to open the web browser/add panel just visit the email and most info is filled in automatically. (this only works with gmail)

Syncs with Package Tracker for android via web access.. (I'm not the creator of the Android App)

SMS Alerts (doesn't work with multi-factor authentication)

Works with Growl for Windows

REQUIRES: .Net Framework 4.0

this program was compressed using 7-Zip if you have problems extracting then please download & install 7-Zip for your system.

Want to support development? click the "Package Tracker Web Site >" link below to open my PayPal donation page!
summary: Track Packages Shipped Via FedEx, UPS, & USPS
